title: Interpretation of seeing a wooden comb and its meaning in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a comb in a dream for a man: If the dreamer is a man and he sees in a dream that he is combing his hair, then this is a sign of breastfeeding or marriage to a familiar person. If he combs his hair with a silver comb, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of money, and if he sees a wooden comb, this indicates that he A person who cares about his family and family and takes care of them. If he dreams that he combs his wife, this is a sign of reconciliation between them after a quarrel. Interpretation of seeing a comb in a dream for a single girl: This dream is good news. If an unmarried girl sees a comb in her dream, it means that happy news will knock on her door, and if she combs her hair, it means that her desires will come true, God willing. Almighty. By studying the meanings of the type and color of the comb, we find that when an unmarried woman dreams of a golden comb, this means the entry of a person into her life, whether he is a loyal friend or a love relationship, while the ivory comb indicates success and superiority, while the wooden comb shows that she will be associated with a person of nobility, and as for the iron comb It is a sign of evil as it shows in her life the presence of people who hate her and hurt her with the words behind them. And her back, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees that someone is giving her a comb in a dream, this indicates participation in many businesses with this person. Interpretation of a dream about a comb for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself combing her hair, this indicates joy, pleasure, livelihood, and blessing in her home. Regarding the meaning of the colors and types of combs in a married woman’s dream, we find that the golden comb indicates her exposure to injustice by her husband, the iron comb indicates worries and sorrows, the wooden comb indicates good news and stability, and the plastic comb indicates her harmony with her husband. Even if she sees her husband combing her hair in a dream, this is news. About an imminent pregnancy, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that someone is giving her a comb in a dream, this is a sign of many blessings and benefits that she will receive through this person. Interpretation of a dream about a comb for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees herself in a dream that she is combing her hair, this indicates She will give birth soon. The golden comb in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication that she will give birth to a child, unlike the silver comb, which indicates the birth of a female, and if she combs her hair with a wooden comb in her dream, this bodes well. In health, God knows best.

title: Interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream is the correct comprehensive interpretation

preview.html: Today, through the Encyclopedia website, we present an article about the interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream. Since the world of visions is a vast and vast world full of symbols, meanings and signs, God Almighty is the only one who knows the secret of visions and dreams. Many people and researchers are interested in interpreting visions and how a person sees in his dream something happening or a sign of good news or a warning, which is a real world. There is no room for doubt in it and its interpretations, because God Almighty mentioned this world in the Book of Truth, as dreams were mentioned in Surat Yusuf several times with different dreams and all of them came true. God Almighty said in His Noble Book, Surah Yusuf, verse 36: “And there entered the prison with him two young men. One of them said, ‘Indeed, I see myself pressing wine.’ And the other said, ‘Indeed, I see myself carrying bread on my head from which birds eat. Tell us its interpretation. Indeed, we see you among the doers of good.’” God Almighty is true, as these two visions were one of the reasons for Joseph’s access to the treasures of the earth. In the following, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream Then we will learn about the interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream, as the snake causes anxiety in a dream because the snake in general has evil qualities Because it contains poison, which causes dreamers to fear this dream. Which some may consider a warning from someone or what they did, and the interpretation of this vision in detail as stated in the interpretation of scholars: Seeing a snake in a dream is considered one of the visions that are not commendable in places and good in places. Seeing a yellow snake in a dream indicates that there is an enemy who wants to capture the dreamer. Killing a yellow snake in a dream symbolizes getting rid of worries and problems and a new beginning. Explaining killing a snake in a dream to get rid of the enemy, and changing the situation for the better, God willing. Seeing a snake in a dream while it is still and does not move, symbolizes the presence of relatives and friends who appear face to face and carry within them problems, fears and great hatred, but God helps the dreamer and the matter ends. With the emergence of truth and knowledge of lovers about evil. It indicates that we chase the yellow snake and attack it and kill it and cut it with a knife. The yellow snake in the dreamer's dream symbolizes that there is a big problem that the dreamer will face and God Almighty is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream of a yellow snake for a single woman The unmarried girl always wishes from God Almighty to grant her goodness and happiness and to grant her success in everything that comes from her life, and the waste in studying and seeing such as seeing a snake or a snake can lead to anxiety and indicate panic. In the following, we will learn about this vision together: Seeing a snake in the dream of an unmarried girl is an unpleasant vision. Seeing a yellow snake in the dream of an unmarried girl means that it is a warning of something. Seeing a yellow snake in the dream of an unmarried girl symbolizes that there is something she is hiding from her parents. The yellow snake hiding in the house of the unmarried girl or in her room interprets the presence of big problems in her life. The yellow snake in the dream of an unmarried girl symbolizes disputes and problems

title: Interpretation of a snake entering the house in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The meaning of a snake in the house for a single girl, a married woman, or a pregnant woman, whether there are many, few, small, or large, talking in the room on the bed outside the house, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a dream about a snake entering the house. The snake in most dreams is interpreted as an enemy of the dreamer. Whoever sees it A snake in his house, this may mean that the dreamer will gain something of value, such as his wife’s pregnancy or a promotion at work. Whoever sees a snake biting twice on his body, this indicates that victory will come to you over your enemies from God. Whoever sees that there is a snake talking to him in a peaceful way, this indicates On the presence of a dear and close person who will reach you. Whoever sees many snakes in the house, or even a few of them, this indicates the bounties of God, such as money and victory for Muslims, and also ample provision. If you see a snake entering your home, but someone helped it enter, this indicates that there are those around you who consider Friends, but enemies waiting for the opportunity to overthrow you. Whoever sees that the snake entered the house and then left safely, this means that the enemies are strangers. Whoever sees that the snake entered the house and the dreamer killed the snake, this indicates that the woman will be affected by death. And whoever sees that the snake entered his house and reached the bed, this indicates On the collapse of things and the blackness of the disaster. The dream also indicates that everyone in the house will move to another place. If his wife is pregnant and sees a snake entering the house, this indicates that the fetus is also male. If you see a small snake, a house full of snakes indicates kindness, happiness, and improving the family situation. If you see a black snake, This indicates the spread of hostility and hatred, because the interpretation of the black snake is basically enemies. Whoever sees snake meat in a dream, this indicates pleasure and happiness. Killing snakes in your dream means killing the enemy and getting rid of evil and deceit. Al-Nabulsi explains that the snake entering the house indicates enmity to a family member or relative. Seeing a snake indicates Close to the house until the neighbor feels jealous of what God has blessed you with. Interpretation of a snake entering the house in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of crying in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of burning crying in a dream is the most controversial, and it is one of the topics that concerns many. Like other dreams, the interpretation of which varies according to people. Some interpretations are disturbing, while others are hopeful and invite the dreamer to be optimistic. The interpretation of seeing crying in a dream contains many opinions, and the interpretation varies depending on the person’s condition and depending on the nature of the crying in the dream, and this we will learn through the encyclopedia.Interpretation of crying in a dreamInterpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn al-NabulsiIbn al-Nabulsi says: If he sees in a dream that he is screaming loudly and slapping And he screams and cuts his pockets, this is a great sign that a misfortune has occurred in that person’s life and that he will be harmed, but if he cries. It is only intense without being associated with something like that, so this is a sign of kindness. If a person sees in his dream that he is crying loudly but without making a sound, this is evidence that the dreamer will live a quiet life full of joy and pleasure. And if he sees that he is crying behind people in... A funeral, but he does not make a sound while crying, this is evidence that he will get rid of all his worries and will receive good news soon. If one sees that he is crying a lot and listening to the Qur’an at the same time, this indicates that the dreamer is close to God and that his heart is pure. And if the crying is From the fear of God, this is evidence of sincere repentance on the part of the dreamer, and that he will reach heights with God. If a person sees in a dream that he is crying over a dead person, and that dead person complains about some people, then this matter indicates that the deceased is condemned and wants someone to pay his debts. On his behalf. If a person sees in his dream that a dead person is crying, this is evidence that this dead person is comfortable and blissful, and that he is in a high position. Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that if a person sees in a dream that he is crying a lot and screaming, then the vision carries two things, It can bring the arrival of good news and it can indicate the coming of a great calamity for the dreamer. When a man sees himself in his pajamas crying, this indicates the distress and distress of the dreamer. In the case of intense crying in the dream, with the inability to shed tears, this indicates that the dreamer is The vision is in great distress and it appears that he cannot bear the matter and that he cannot overcome the ordeal. Seeing intense crying during prayer indicates the dreamer’s desire to repent and stay away from sins and disobedience and that he will get rid of these things and get closer to God. In the event that you see profuse crying with cracks in Pockets and a person wearing black clothes, this vision is not good and shows bad things and the arrival of misfortunes, as it sometimes indicates the death of a relative. Seeing the dead person crying loudly and screaming loudly is considered an undesirable vision, as it indicates that the dead person will be tortured in his afterlife, and indicates The dead person’s need for someone to pray for him and believe in him. On his behalf to alleviate the torment he suffers from. As for the silent crying of the dead, it is a praiseworthy matter, and indicates that he will be blessed in the afterlife, and that he is at home in the highest places with his Lord. If a woman sees that she is crying loudly and screaming, this is a sign of

As for the silent crying of the dead, it is a praiseworthy matter, and indicates that he will be blessed in the afterlife, and that he is in his home in the highest with his Lord. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about me being at my ex-wife’s house in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream that I am in my ex-wife’s house? Many women or girls are looking for an interpretation of a dream of being in a divided house, and this dream is one of the most common dreams that a girl sees after her divorce, as divorce is one of the most difficult things that every couple goes through. Dreams can give us some meanings and interpretations of what is happening in real life, and for this we will learn about the interpretation of the existential dream in my ex-wife's house and the meanings it suggests through different people. Interpretation of a dream about the return of a divorced woman to her husband Seeing a divorced woman return to her ex-husband in a dream may mean that she is returning to him in reality. This vision may also indicate that this girl will marry someone other than her ex-husband, so that her surname can be married again. A man's vision of his ex-wife returning may be a sign of his recovery from illness soon. This vision may be a sign of the dreamer's return to Almighty God, repentance, and stopping sins and transgressions. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about killing with a knife in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Interpretation of a dream about being in my ex-wife's house Seeing a divorced woman entering her ex-husband's house can be a sign of deep regret for what she did. It is possible that the interpretation of a dream about being in my ex-husband's house is the dreamer's desire to return to the ex-partner and deep regret for the divorce. Her presence in the ex-husband's house in a divorced woman's dream is evidence of her return to her husband and the beginning of a new life. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman from her ex-husband. Seeing a divorced woman pregnant from her ex-husband in a dream is evidence that she is returning To her husband again. It may be evidence of marital happiness and stability that will fill her life with her husband. If the dreamer sees someone else pregnant in his dream, this means that this person is suffering from many problems during this period. Pregnancy with twins in a dream is evidence of a new project that will return to the dreamer with a large income. Interpretation of a dream of hugging a divorced woman A divorced woman seeing her ex-husband hugging her indicates her ex-husband's desire to return to her again. It is likely that seeing the ex-husband hugging his ex-wife in a dream means the dreamer's desire to return to her ex-husband again. Also, seeing the chest of a divorced man in a dream can mean the dreamer's desire to forget all the problems she faced with her ex-husband. Interpretation of seeing my ex-wife in my family's house in a dream The divorced woman's vision of her ex-wife while she is from her family in a dream is evidence of her ex-husband's sadness and regret for what he did towards her. Seeing the ex-husband talking to his ex-wife's family in a dream is evidence of his return to his wife again. This vision indicates the owner's desire to return to her ex-husband again. The ex-husband's entry into his ex-wife's house shows his desire to get his wife back. Interpretation of seeing my ex-wife in a dream Seeing the ex-husband's new wife in a dream indicates that this It is the reason for the divorce between them. This vision also indicates that the dreamer was wronged by her ex-husband. The dream may indicate that the dreamer will return to her husband.

title: Interpretation of a dream about running with a stranger in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about running with a stranger in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about running with a stranger in a dream, it is one of the disturbing dreams that the dreamer wants to know the interpretation of, but it should be noted that these interpretations are the interpretations of interpretation scholars and not the interpretations of site administrators. Interpretation of a dream Running with a Stranger in a DreamIn the event that someone sees that he is lying with a strange man in a dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during those days. If someone sees that he is running with another person, this may indicate a happy occasion It brought him together with his family and friends. Seeing yourself running with a familiar face in a dream may indicate good times that the dreamer is going through at that time. If one saw that he was lying with one of his friends, this may indicate that a major problem that the dreamer was facing has been overcome And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running on the road in a dream: Anyone who sees in his dream that he is running very quickly on the road, this may indicate his many skills and abilities to succeed. Running on the road in a dream can mean assuming a great responsibility, thanks to God. If someone sees that he He was running in a dream and did not know in which direction. This may indicate that he is afraid of his future and cannot determine his goals. Running on the road in a dream is evidence of the great effort and energy that the dreamer has to achieve his dreams. Interpretation of a dream of running in the dark in a dream: Seeing yourself Running in the dark in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s desire to isolate himself from others. Seeing him running in the dark in a dream may mean that he was feeling lonely at that time, and God knows best. If one saw that he was running in the dark, this may indicate rejection. The negative feelings that the dreamer was experiencing at that time, and God knows best. In the event that one sees that he is running in the dark, this may indicate the benefit he obtains after the suffering that the dreamer endured in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running in the desert in a dream may Running in the desert in a dream indicates that there were a large number of happy things in the dreamer’s life at that time. If one saw that he was running in the desert, this may indicate happy times that the dreamer had at that time. Seeing running in the desert in a dream It may indicate the happiness and joy that the dreamer experiences during this time, thanks to God. A dream of running in the desert in a dream may indicate the passage of a difficult period that the dreamer is going through in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of running in an orchard in a dream: Anyone who dreams of running in An orchard may indicate the dreamer's upcoming joys at that time. Falling into an unfamiliar orchard in a dream may indicate the confidence that the dreamer feels in those days. If one sees that he is in an orchard with someone, this may indicate the affection and compassion that exists between them. title: Interpretation of a dream about a single man and various issues

preview.html: Today we will present to you the interpretation of a single man’s dream and different situations. There are many indications that a man mentions one girl, and the vision varies depending on the person who saw the dream, whether she is single. A girl, married or pregnant as a male child or an adult man, is considered one of the disturbing dreams that many cannot tell the interpretation sheikhs about and are searching for its interpretation and wondering about it, so we will present it to you today. Interpretation of seeing a man in a dream for a single woman, in this article in the encyclopedia through the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about a single man. Interpretation of a dream about a man narrated by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing a man in a dream means a long life or a lot of money and many children. And if he sees That the “male genital organ” was mentioned to him in his dream and he was sad and worried, it means that he will lose one of his sons, or accomplish something, or travel, and if that man is sick, she will die, and if she has a high position and position, she will be removed from the position. Seeing a man erect in a dream indicates tireless striving and diligence in working and achieving desires and goals. Seeing a man with three heads indicates a large number of male children, and the penis being divided into three parts may indicate the death of the man. If a person sees in his dream that he is holding another man’s penis in his hand, This indicates an abundance of money and money. And whoever sees in a dream that he is taking a very hot loaf of bread from his penis, this indicates extreme poverty. If one sees that his penis is cut off from his wife’s reproductive organs, this means that his wife will terminate her pregnancy. If one sees in a dream that the testicles They have been cut off and only the male remains, this means that this man will not have girls. Seeing a person weak and weak in his memory indicates the illness of one of his male children. And whoever sees in his dream that his memory is long, this indicates that he will fall into worries and sorrows. If a man sees that his organs are If an unmarried girl sees a man in her dream, this means that this girl will gain honor and prestige. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream may indicate that the man is male because Her many desires. If an unmarried girl sees a man in a dream, this may mean that this girl will get married soon. Seeing a man mentioning an unmarried girl in a dream may indicate that she will excel in her studies, be successful, and be highly appreciated. Interpretation of a man’s dream of a married womanIf a woman sees A married woman sees a man in her dream, this means that her married life is blessed with stability and reassurance. If a married woman sees a man in her dream, this may indicate that she is a woman of ill repute and has many relationships with men. But if a married woman sees a man mentioned in her dream, it means that her husband He will gain prestige and power. If a married woman sees that she has a penis similar to a man’s, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. However, if a married woman sees that her penis is cut off or weak, this indicates that there are many problems between her and her husband.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dead person in a dream?  Seeing the dead in a dream while he is tired and the interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream while he is silent

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream cannot be limited to several symbols or signs. Instead, it is necessary to specify the details of what the dreamer saw and the body in which the deceased appeared. The dead are dead, but they still send us certain signals that carry many clues, which may be messages of reassurance, need, or other things. Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream? One of the most correct visions that carry real events and feelings is seeing a dead person. , especially if it is close to the dreamer's heart. The interpretation of a dream in which he sees a dead person giving him advice, indicates that the dreamer has a problem and needs someone to help him get rid of it as quickly as possible. If your relative to whom you were very attached dies, it is expected that he will not leave your imagination easily and you will see him coming to you Which makes the pain of separation easier for you, and according to its beauty and elegance it appears on it. This makes you reassure him and congratulate the soul that saw him, as they are still alive and can give charity and pray for him. Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The imam said: If the dead person has lost his mind without paying his debts, then his soul will not calm down until he pays them, so he comes to someone. His children in his sleep and he appears worried and concerned, so that it is a clear indication of the need for his children to search for debtors and pay the money owed by their father even if he is pregnant, and some deposits and deposits must be returned as quickly as possible to their owners. If the dreamer is tired in his life and feels that his luck Little and no good for him, Satan can lead him to a sense of despair and hopelessness, so we will find that the arrival of the dead in his dream will direct him to the right path and remind him that the future is better and more permanent, so patience and calculation is what is required of every neighbor man. Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream for a woman The single girl who has ambitions and wants to achieve them, but despair begins to creep into her soul due to her failure to take one of her steps, which means that she sees her stupid father patting her shoulders. The psychological support she wants and the drive and motivation she is about to lose will come back to her and push her to continue walking towards the summit she has set. He is looking for her, but if she is engaged to her fiancé and feels uncomfortable, the same dream means that she is a worthwhile person and does not need to allow appearances to control her choices. The translators said that she is a reckless girl who does not follow the customs of her family or the traditions of her community. Believing that she lives only one life and wants to enjoy it as she believes, the dead may come to her as a reminder and warning that the world will pass and only good deeds will remain, and her ally will be success and good luck. Seeing the dead alive in a single woman’s dream is seeing the dead as if he rose from His death and his return to life symbolizes the hope and optimism that permeates the dreamer's soul and makes him live longer than before. Dean God cares about his relationship with her and gives her the love and affection she deserves. But if you find that an immoral dialogue is taking place between them, then it is just whispers. Where no

title: Interpretation of burial in a dream: Seeing burial in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of burying an unmarried pregnant woman for a divorced woman, dead or alive, and the dead are buried in the grave and more by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about burial in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Burial: Whoever sees his death and burial travels far away and does not find money. Burial If someone dreams that he died and was buried, then he travels. A long way to go and no money. Whoever dreams that he was buried in a grave without dying, and if he knows who buried him, then he will begin to suffer injustice, oppression, and imprisonment. If he sees that he has thrown him into the grave, it will cause him to perish. If he puts him in the grave, he will get a house. If his land was leveled, he would get that much money. They said: Whoever is buried has spoiled his religion, unless he comes out of his grave after being buried. Whoever is buried in a dream after sunrise, noon, or sunset, this indicates the command of evil and the prohibition of good. As for burying the living, it is deception and deception, and the wealth of the buried person may appear after his poverty, and he may marry him after his celibacy and forget him after his loneliness. Burying the dead among the living indicates that the debt has been absorbed as it is. The second burial of the deceased in a dream is a disdain to overcome the crime he committed. Burying the dead represents unity, elite, and tenderness between relatives. Burial may be confinement, illness, marriage, a deposit, or a mortgage. Whoever sees that he died or was buried will die without repentance. If he sees that he has come out of the grave, he will repent. He said: Burial indicates marriage. And whoever sees that they buried him without death, they will imprison him and put him in hardship. If you attend the burial ceremony of one of your relatives and the sun shines on those present, this is a sign of the health of the relatives, and perhaps a happy marriage will take place for one of them. But if gloomy weather comes and rain falls, bad news of absence and illness will soon come to you, and a feeling of despair will prevail in business circles. Burial, when the rituals are sad and hurt faces, indicates a hostile environment or a rapid approach to this environment. Interpretation of a dream about burial in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Whoever sees that he is burying a man alive, then he will triumph over his enemy. And whoever sees: that a group buried a man, then they united for his death, and there is no good. In burial, it is sufficient. And whoever sees that he is burying his enemy, he will triumph over him. And whoever sees that he is burying something of an animal, and if his type is outcast, then he will meet a person attributed to this type, and if they love him, then this is unfortunate, and perhaps something will be saved. And whoever sees that he is burying something Not alive, then worry about the world. Whoever sees that he is burying a species that does not need to be buried, then wastes his property on what does not happen as a result of that, and perhaps this indicates depositing this for someone because man’s origin is filth. In short, the dream of burial is interpreted in eleven ways. : Victory, travel, distance, imprisonment, poverty, turmoil, forbidden marriage, helplessness, magic, distress, and corruption of things. Dream of being buried in a grave - YouTube
